statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerContactInformation;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM CustomerContactInformation ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number, email_address FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE email_address LIKE 'john.doe%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerContactInformation ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerContactInformation WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state='NY';
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city FROM addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT id, street_address, city, state FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customers.first_name, addresses.city FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM CustomerContacts;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM CustomerContacts ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT note_text, note_date FROM CustomerNotes WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT city, state, postal_code FROM CustomerAddresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM CustomerContacts WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state FROM CustomerAddresses;
SELECT note_id, note_text, note_date FROM CustomerNotes WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email_address, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM CustomerContacts JOIN CustomerAddresses ON CustomerContacts.customer_id = CustomerAddresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city='New York';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.payment_date, p.payment_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id=o.customer_id INNER JOIN payments p ON o.order_id=p.order_id;
SELECT a.address_line1, a.city, a.state, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id=a.customer_id WHERE c.last_name='Smith';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT order_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM orders GROUP BY order_date ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payment_amount < total_amount;
